Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The teacher lead feedback is more attuned to the assignment or task while GenAi is more broad and sometimes go off topic to assist.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher makes me feel sometimes enlightened to work harder while some teachers put you down and make you feel like shit. While GenAi is not personal with the feedback so i have no emotions
